name: Cryorose
description: A mystical flower-dragon that blooms in eternal winter. Its crystalline petals can freeze enemies while its vines deliver precise strikes. A guardian of frozen gardens.

ability.name: Glacial Bloom
ability.description: Ice-type moves have a 30% chance to freeze the target, and Grass-type moves heal the user for 25% of damage dealt

moves.name: Frozen Petal
moves.description: Sharp crystalline petals strike the target. Has a high chance to freeze.

moves.name: Vine Whip
moves.description: Strikes the target with slender vines. Heals the user slightly.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.description: A howling blizzard that may freeze the target and all nearby enemies.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.description: Charges on the first turn, then unleashes a powerful beam. Healing is doubled.

habitat: Frozen gardens and mystical ice caves
